Settings.description: Defines the globabl settings for Sourcebot.

maxFileSize.description: The maximum size of a file (in bytes) to be indexed. Files that exceed this maximum will not be indexed.

maxTrigramCount.description: The maximum number of trigrams per document. Files that exceed this maximum will not be indexed.

reindexIntervalMs.description: The interval (in milliseconds) at which the indexer should re-index all repositories.

resyncConnectionPollingIntervalMs.description: The polling rate (in milliseconds) at which the db should be checked for connections that need to be re-synced.

reindexRepoPollingIntervalMs.description: The polling rate (in milliseconds) at which the db should be checked for repos that should be re-indexed.

indexConcurrencyMultiple.description: The multiple of the number of CPUs to use for indexing.

configSyncConcurrencyMultiple.description: The multiple of the number of CPUs to use for syncing the configuration.

gcConcurrencyMultiple.description: The multiple of the number of CPUs to use for garbage collection.

gcGracePeriodMs.description: The grace period (in milliseconds) for garbage collection. Used to prevent deleting shards while they're being loaded.

repoIndexTimeoutMs.description: The timeout (in milliseconds) for a repo indexing to timeout.

connections.description: Defines a collection of connections from varying code hosts that Sourcebot should sync with. This is only available in single-tenancy mode.
